Champion.title: Champion
Champion.Name: [color=#ffaf20]Champion[/color]
Champion.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color] / [color=#ffff50]block[/color] / [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 

     apply 3 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy

Gain [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] equal to the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on self

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]
Champion.Description_Unit:
On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color] / [color=#ffff50]block[/color] / [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 

     apply 3 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy

Gain [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] equal to the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on self

Samnite.title: Samnite
Samnite.Name: [color=#40a000]Samnite[/color]
Samnite.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]empty armor slot[/color]: 

     [color=#5050ff]+200 Armor[/color]
     [color=#ff8030]+100 Hit[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]:

     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy
     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 10

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]
Samnite.Description_Unit:
Per [color=#ffff50]empty armor slot[/color]: 

     [color=#5050ff]+200 Armor[/color]
     [color=#ff8030]+100 Hit[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]:

     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against a random adjacent enemy
     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 10

Sahasi.title: Sahasi
Sahasi.Name: [color=#a050e0]Sahasi[/color]
Sahasi.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage: 

     increase it by the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on yourself
     apply 2 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]"Physical" damage is Slash, Blunt and Pierce[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage:

     apply 2 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]"Physical" damage is Slash, Blunt and Pierce[/color]

DeathKnight.title: DeathKnight
DeathKnight.Name: [color=#a0a000]Death Knight[/color]
DeathKnight.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]ally death[/color] / [color=#ffff50]enemy death[/color]:

     apply 10 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 50

On [color=#ffff50]block[/color] / [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 

    apply [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] to the attacker equal to the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on yourself
DeathKnight.Description_Unit:
On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color] / [color=#ffff50]block[/color] / [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 

     apply 3 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy

Gain [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] equal to the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on self

Dianmai.title: Dianmai
Dianmai.Name: [color=#70ff00]Dianmai[/color]
Dianmai.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]bare fist[/color]:

     apply 5 [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] to the target

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color]:

     apply 2 [color=#7f206f]Evasion[/color] to yourself

On [color=#ffff50]hit[/color]:

     deal [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10 * stacks of Evasion on self[/color]
Dianmai.Description_Unit:
On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color] / [color=#ffff50]block[/color] / [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 

     apply 3 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     perform an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] against an adjacent enemy

Gain [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] equal to the stacks of [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] on self

Executioner.title: Executioner
Executioner.Name: [color=#ff1010]Executioner[/color]
Executioner.Description:
[color=#5050ff]+200 Armor[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]adjacent attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]two-handing[/color] weapon:

     deal 500 [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] damage to the target
     deal 500 [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to the target

On [color=#ffff50]kill[/color]:

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] 100

[color=#5050ff]+200 Armor[/color]

MindKnightPrestige.title: MindKnightPrestige
MindKnightPrestige.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Mind Knight[/color]
MindKnightPrestige.Description:
Per point of [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]two-handing[/color] weapon:
     
     [color=#ff8030]+30 Hit[/color]
     [color=#50ffff]+20 Dodge[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked by an adjacent enemy[/color]:

     apply 5 [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself
MindKnightPrestige.Description_Unit:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage:

     deal [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * WIL[/color]

Pyromaniac.title: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac.Name: [color=#ff7000]Pyromaniac[/color]
Pyromaniac.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]:

     deal 300 [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage:

     apply 1 [color=#ff7000]Inflame[/color] to yourself

Exultite.title: Exultite
Exultite.Name: [color=#ff7000]Exultite[/color]
Exultite.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing damage to an ally[/color]:

     apply 2 [color=#ff7000]Inflame[/color] to yourself

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] enemies live: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] and [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to all units in a 3 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 1+ (stacks of Inflame on self * 10)[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]:

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage:

     apply 1 [color=#ff7000]Inflame[/color] to yourself

Arsonist.title: Arsonist
Arsonist.Name: [color=#00a000]Arsonist[/color]
Arsonist.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]:

     summon 10 [color=#20af20]Roots[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]: 

     summon 3 [color=#20af20]Roots[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]:

     deal 75 [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Roots are stationary projections of lifeforce that entangle enemies[/color]
Arsonist.Description_Unit:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] enemies live:

     apply 5 [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to all enemies in a 2 tile range
     summon 2 [color=#20af20]Briarfolk[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Briarfolk are human-shaped vines that entangle enemies[/color]

Surtmir.title: Surtmir
Surtmir.Name: [color=#5080ff]Surtmir[/color]
Surtmir.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]:

     apply 5 [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to all enemies in a 2 tile range

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color]:

     deal [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = stacks of Scorch + Freeze on target[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Briarfolk are human-shaped vines that entangle enemies[/color]

Kashra.title: Kashra
Kashra.Name: [color=#d040a0]Kashra[/color]
Kashra.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]initial attack[/color]:

     perform 2 [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against the target

On [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]:

     [color=#ff5050]remove[/color] [color=#a030b0]Stasis[/color] from yourself
     apply 3 [color=#ff7000]Inflame[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

Gothi.Name: [color=#0060ff]Gothi[/color]
Gothi.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]step[/color]:

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage:

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage:

On [color=#ffff50]killing an enemy[/color]:

Alizeh.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]:

     deal 100 [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage to 5 enemies

On [color=#ffff50]step[/color]:

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] or [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage:

     apply 1 [color=#0060ff]Charge[/color] to yourself

ArchMagus.Name: [color=#8030af]Arch-Magus[/color]
ArchMagus.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]:

     perform a 100 damage [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] against 2 enemies in a 5 tile range

On [color=#ffff50]hit[/color]:

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#8020a0]Meditate[/color]:

     deal 100 [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage in a path to a random enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]This hit bypasses all defense and triggers on-hit effects[/color]

Psychonaut.title: Psychonaut
Psychonaut.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Psychonaut[/color]
Psychonaut.Description:
[color=#ffff50]+3 stacks[/color] of any [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] applied by you
[color=#ff5050]-3 stacks[/color] of any [color=#a030b0]Stasis[/color] applied to you [color=#a0a0a0]Minimum 1[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage:

Venite.Description:

     apply 3 of the [color=#ffff50]same effect[/color] to all allies in a 3 tile range

Oozemancer.title: Oozemancer
Oozemancer.Name: [color=#70ff00]Oozemancer[/color]
Oozemancer.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]an Ooze killing an enemy[/color] / [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] enemies live:  

     summon an [color=#70ff00]Ooze[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]Ooze summon[/color]:

     you deal 300 [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to all enemies in a 3 tile range

[color=#70ff00]Oozes[/color] are now treated as [color=#c050ff]Familiars[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned Familiars gain extra Life and Hit from your Glory, and are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

Necromancer.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] enemies live:

     summon 2 [color=#a0a000]Skeleton Warriors[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]an ally being killed by an enemy[/color]:

     perform a [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] against the killer

[color=#a0a0a0]Hit damage = 20 * # of Allies

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type

Skeleton warriors are armored undead that fight with curved slashing blades
